languages.text: "О элантах, если бы ты только мог{mf||ла} услышать ее мольбы и проклятья... Мое сердце разбивается тысячей осколков при одном взгляде на эту измученную душу. Но ее слова... ее слова секут мой разум больнее и безжалостней, чем треххвостая плеть темных кузенов истязает плоть жертв".

traits.locale_text: "О элантах, если бы ты только мог{mf||ла} услышать ее мольбы и проклятья... Мое сердце разбивается тысячей осколков при одном взгляде на эту измученную душу. Но ее слова... ее слова секут мой разум больнее и безжалостней, чем треххвостая плеть темных кузенов истязает плоть жерт
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, elantach, if only you could hear her pleas and her curses... My heart shatters into a thousand pieces at the mere sight of this tormented soul. But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments its victims' flesh."
languages.original_text: "О элантах, если бы ты только мог{mf||ла} услышать ее мольбы и проклятья... Мое сердце разбивается тысячей осколков при одном взгляде на эту измученную душу. Но ее слова... ее слова секут мой разум больнее и безжалостней, чем треххвостая плеть темных кузенов истязает плоть жертв".

traits.locale_text: "O elantach, if only you could hear her pleas and her curses... My heart shatters into a thousand pieces at the mere sight of this tormented soul. But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments the flesh of its victims
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, elantach, if only you could hear her pleas and her curses... My heart shatters into a thousand pieces at the mere sight of this tormented soul. But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments its victims' flesh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Oh, elantach, si pudieses oír sus súplicas y sus maldiciones... Se me parte el corazón en mil pedazos con solo mirar a esta alma atormentada. Pero sus palabras... sus palabras suponen para mí un flagelo mucho más doloroso y despiadado que el azote de un látigo de tres colas».
languages.original_text: "Oh, elantach, if only you could hear her pleas and her curses... My heart shatters into a thousand pieces at the mere sight of this tormented soul. But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, elantach, si pudieses oír sus súplicas y sus maldiciones... Se me parte el corazón en mil pedazos con solo mirar a esta alma atormentada. Pero sus palabras... sus palabras suponen para mí un flagelo mucho más doloroso y despiadado que el azote de un látigo de tres colas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、エランタ。彼女の願いと呪いの声があなたにも届いたなら…この苦しめられた魂を見るだけで、この心は粉々に砕け散りそうだ。しかし彼女の言葉が…何より彼女の言葉が、三尾鞭が犠牲者の肉体を裂くよりも痛々しく、無慈悲に我が心を打ちのめしてくる」
languages.original_text: "Oh, elantach, if only you could hear her pleas and her curses... My heart shatters into a thousand pieces at the mere sight of this tormented soul. But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、エランタ。彼女の願いと呪いの声があなたにも届いたなら…この苦しめられた魂を見るだけで、この心は粉々に砕け散りそうだ。しかし彼女の言葉が…何より彼女の言葉が、三尾鞭が犠牲者の肉体を裂くよりも痛々しく、無慈悲に我が心を打ちのめしてくる」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “哦，外界人，要是你也能听到她的祈求和诅咒就好了。光是看一眼这饱受折磨的灵魂，我的心仿佛就要碎成了千百片。而她的话语……她的话语鞭笞着我的心灵，冷酷无情，远胜于鞭打受害者的三尾钉鞭。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, elantach, if only you could hear her pleas and her curses... My heart shatters into a thousand pieces at the mere sight of this tormented soul. But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: “哦，外界人，要是你也能听到她的祈求和诅咒就好了。光是看一眼这饱受折磨的灵魂，我的心仿佛就要碎成了千百片。而她的话语……她的话语鞭笞着我的心灵，冷酷无情，远胜于鞭打受害者的三尾钉鞭。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, elantach, si seulement vous pouviez entendre ses suppliques et ses imprécations... Mon cœur se brise en mille morceaux à la simple vue de cette âme tourmentée. Mais ses mots... Ses mots tourmentent mon esprit plus cruellement et plus durement encore que le fouet qui arrache la peau de ses victimes. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, elantach, if only you could hear her pleas and her curses... My heart shatters into a thousand pieces at the mere sight of this tormented soul. But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, elantach, si seulement vous pouviez entendre ses suppliques et ses imprécations... Mon cœur se brise en mille morceaux à la simple vue de cette âme tourmentée. Mais ses mots... Ses mots tourmentent mon esprit plus cruellement et plus durement encore que le fouet qui arrache la peau de ses victimes. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, Elantach, wenn Ihr doch nur ihr Flehen und ihre Flüche hören könntet ... Mir zerreißt es das Herz beim bloßen Anblick dieser gepeinigten Seele. Aber ihre Worte ... sie peitschen meinen Geist aus, schmerzhafter und unbarmherziger als dreischwänzige Peitschen das Fleisch ihrer Opfer quälen."
languages.original_text: "Oh, elantach, if only you could hear her pleas and her curses... My heart shatters into a thousand pieces at the mere sight of this tormented soul. But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Elantach, wenn Ihr doch nur ihr Flehen und ihre Flüche hören könntet ... Mir zerreißt es das Herz beim bloßen Anblick dieser gepeinigten Seele. Aber ihre Worte ... sie peitschen meinen Geist aus, schmerzhafter und unbarmherziger als dreischwänzige Peitschen das Fleisch ihrer Opfer quälen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach... Yalvarış ve beddualarını bir duysan... Eziyet çeken bu ruhun görüntüsü bile kalbimi bin parçaya bölüyor. Sözleri... Sözleri; darbelerini kurbanına zulmeden üç kuyruklu kamçıdan daha büyük bir acıyla, daha zalimce zihnime indiriyor."
languages.original_text: "Oh, elantach, if only you could hear her pleas and her curses... My heart shatters into a thousand pieces at the mere sight of this tormented soul. But her words... her words lash my mind more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip torments its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Ah elantach... Yalvarışlarını ve beddualarını bir duyabilseydin... Bu eziyet içindeki ruhun görüntüsü bile kalbimi bin parçaya bölüyor. Ancak söylediği sözler... Sözleri, zihnime darbelerini kurbanına zulmeden üç kuyruklu kamçıdan daha büyük bir acıyla ve daha zalimce indiriyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
